item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Kiersten White
item.description: "Oh relax." I waved my hand dismissively. "If he wanted to kill me, he already would have. I brought him all these sharp pencils, ideal for stabbing, and he's been a perfect gentleman." -- Kiersten White

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "I promise to love you forever - every single day of forever." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Irony is wasted on the stupid" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "A brave man acknowledges the strength of others." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Ken Kesey
item.description: "You can't really be strong until you can see a funny side to things." -- Ken Kesey

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "And the little screaming fact that sounds through all history: repression works only to strengthen and knit the repressed." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are, and always have been, my dream." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are my best friend as well as my lover, and I do not know which side of you I enjoy the most. I treasure each side, just as I have treasured our life together." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "We fell in love, despite our differences, and once we did, something rare and beautiful was created. For me, love like that has only happened once, and that's why every minute we spent together has been seared in my memory. I'll never forget a single moment of it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering." -- Nicole Krauss

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Trisha Yearwood
item.description: "What's meant to be will always find a way" -- Trisha Yearwood

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Zelda Fitzgerald
item.description: "Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold." -- Zelda Fitzgerald

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The heart was made to be broken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Beth Revis
item.description: "I never thought about how important the sky was until I didn't have one." -- Beth Revis

item.title: Ishanie add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
